title: Arrangers' Publishing Company - Marching Band 2011 [ALAC]
description:
*THIS IS THE SECOND UPLOAD OF THIS TORRENT. THE ORIGINAL HAD MANY PEOPLE GETTING STUCK AT 99.6%. I HAVE REMADE THE TORRENT AND HOPEFULLY FIXED THE FILE ISSUES. THANKS, SORRY, AND ENJOY!*

~ APC Marching Band 2011 ~ 

Exclusively Distributed by Hal Leonard Corporation.
This recording not for sale.


The CDs have been ripped losslessly using iTunes 10.4.0.80 with error correction enabled. There are no .cue files, and there are no .log files. The CDs appear flawless (I ripped them just after opening the package) and no errors occurred during ripping.
Files are tagged and include a scan of the CD case.
